amendment.description: Amendment requires that 20 percent of the Federal employees detailed to the private sector under the provisions of the bill be detailed to small businesses.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that of assignments made under bill from agencies to private sector organizations in each year, at least 20 percent are to small business concerns.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Velazquez amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
